name: I Am Overburdened
description: I Am Overburdened is a silly roguelike full of crazy artifacts and a "hero" who has 20 inventory slots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
